statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some House coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.10} per pound with some Kona coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.50} per pound to create \displaystyle{20} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.61} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
